thread.title: Manchester United news: Jose Mourinho’s side must improve this to make top four, says Paul Merson « Arsenal News 24-7
thread.title_full: Manchester United news: Jose Mourinho’s side must improve this to make top four, says Paul Merson « Arsenal News 24-7

title: Manchester United news: Jose Mourinho’s side must improve this to make top four, says Paul Merson « Arsenal News 24-7
text:
No Comments » Jose Mourinho’s side haven’t been taking their chances (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United‘s poor finishing throughout the season is why they’re currently lagging behind in the race for a top four finish, says Arsenal legend Paul Merson. 
Who can catch Chelsea? We assess the chances of the chasing pack 
The Red Devils have the worst attacking record in the top six by some distance at the moment, having scored just 36 times in the Premier League so far this season. 
Despite the fine form of summer signing Zlatan Ibrahimovic, United just haven’t killed teams off in some important games, which Merson says is no accident. United’s strikers have been found wanting at times (Picture: Getty) 
Ultimately, the former Gunners star feels this one key area could be why the club miss out on Champions League qualification come May. Man Utd shooting stats Shots per game (PL rank) – 17 (3rd)
Goals (PL rank) – 36 (7th) 
‘If they sorted out their finishing they would easily be in the top four,’ Merson told Sky Sports. 
‘When you fail to find the net a couple of times it’s unlucky, but now it has to be classed as bad finishing.’
